nodes.bodyText: Maybe it is time to drop this as well. Uyuni will not work anymore with cobbler20. We switched everything to cobbler 3.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -97,18 +97,14 @@ Requires:       perl-Satcon
 Requires:       spacewalk-admin
 Requires:       spacewalk-backend-tools
 Requires:       spacewalk-certs-tools
-%if 0%{?suse_version}
 %if 0%{?build_py3}
-Requires:       python3-PyYAML
+Requires:       (python3-PyYAML or python3-pyyaml)
 %else
-Requires:       python-PyYAML
+Requires:       (python-PyYAML or PyYAML)
 %endif
-%else
 %if 0%{?fedora} >= 22
 Recommends:     cobbler20

nodes.bodyText: Can we keep this in for time being and put it into a cobbler 2 cleanup project? I fixed some cobbler code in #2883 which I also believe referenced some other files.

nodes.bodyText:
There is also $DEFAULT_DOC_ROOT = "/srv/www/htdocs" defined.
I wonder if it would make more sense to put this difference in the code instead of using sed to replace it.
We have in bin/spacewalk-setup already a function is_suse_like() which read os-release.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -130,6 +126,9 @@ setup tasks, re-installation, and upgrades.
 %setup -q
 
 %build
+%if 0%{?rhel} || 0%{?fedora}
+sed -i 's#/etc/pki/trust/anchors#/etc/pki/ca-trust/source/anchors#' lib/Spacewalk/Setup.pm

nodes.bodyText: Let me move the logic there.
